verses.roman:
śuni' bhakta-gaṇa kahe kari' namaskāra
mātāra ye icchā sei sammata sabāra

synonyms: śuni'-hearing this; bhakta-gaṇa—all the devotees; kahe—say; kari'-offering; namaskāra—obeisances; mātāra—of mother Śacīdevī; ye icchā—whatever desire; sei—that; sammata—agreeable; sabāra—to all the devotees
translation: Hearing this appeal from mother Śacī, all the devotees offered obeisances and said, "We all agree to whatever mother Śacī desires."
